TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JustInTimeActivationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class JustInTimeActivationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class JustInTimeActivationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 開啟或關閉 Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程 (Activation)。

span.span: Turns just-in-time (JIT) activation on or off.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 JIT 啟動過程，則它必須不會停用在 COM + 目錄中，反之亦然。If JIT activation is specified, then it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog, and vice versa. 如果啟用 COM + 目錄中，它必須指定在元件上。If enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component. JIT 啟用預設為關閉元件已在 COM + 中，但如果自動交易要求會自動啟用。JIT activation defaults to off for components which are configured in COM+, but is enabled automatically if automatic transactions are requested. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CPP/inspector.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CS/inspector.cs#0)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/VB/inspector.vb#0)]

summary.span: 將 當做參數傳遞來選擇性允許 Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程的停用，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally allowing the disabling of just-in-time (JIT) activation by passing as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要 JIT 啟用的並`val`不能設定為`false`如果值為交易`Supported`， `Required`，或`RequiresNew`。JIT activation is required and `val` cannot be set to `false` if the value for the transaction is `Supported`, `Required`, or `RequiresNew`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新。The following code example creates a new .
